00027 #ifndef _KCHE_TREE_MAPREDUCE_H_
00028 #define _KCHE_TREE_MAPREDUCE_H_

00030 #include "traits.h"

00032 namespace kche_tree {
00033 
00041 template <typename T, unsigned int D, unsigned int i = 0>
00042 struct MapReduce {
00051   template <typename MapFunctor, typename ReduceFunctor>
00052   static T run(const MapFunctor &map, const ReduceFunctor &reduce, const T *a, const T *b) {
00053     return reduce(MapReduce<T, D, i+1>::run(map, reduce, a, b), map(a, b, i));
00054   }
00055 };
00056 
00061 template <typename T, unsigned int D>
00062 struct MapReduce<T, D, D> {
00063   template <typename MapFunctor, typename ReduceFunctor>
00064   static T run(const MapFunctor &map, const ReduceFunctor &reduce, const T *a, const T *b) {
00065     return 0.0;
00066   }
00067 };

00082 template <typename T, unsigned int D, unsigned int BoundCheckFreq=1, unsigned int i=0, unsigned int NextCheck=BoundCheckFreq>
00083 struct BoundedMapReduce {
00095   template <typename MapFunctor, typename ReduceFunctor, typename BoundaryFunctor>
00096   static T run(const MapFunctor &map, const ReduceFunctor &reduce, const BoundaryFunctor& check, const T *a, const T *b, T boundary, T value = Traits<T>::zero()) {
00097     return BoundedMapReduce<T, D, BoundCheckFreq, i+1, NextCheck-1>::run(map, reduce, check, a, b, boundary, reduce(value, map(a, b, i)));
00098   }
00099 };
00100 
00105 template <typename T, unsigned int D, unsigned int BoundCheckFreq, unsigned int i>
00106 struct BoundedMapReduce<T, D, BoundCheckFreq, i, 0> {
00107   template <typename MapFunctor, typename ReduceFunctor, typename BoundaryFunctor>
00108   static T run(const MapFunctor &map, const ReduceFunctor &reduce, const BoundaryFunctor &check, const T *a, const T *b, T boundary, T value) {
00109     if (check(value, boundary))
00110       return value;
00111     return BoundedMapReduce<T, D, BoundCheckFreq, i, BoundCheckFreq>::run(map, reduce, check, a, b, boundary, value);
00112   }
00113 };
00114 
00119 template <typename T, unsigned int D, unsigned int BoundCheckFreq, unsigned int NextCheck>
00120 struct BoundedMapReduce<T, D, BoundCheckFreq, D, NextCheck> {
00121   template <typename MapFunctor, typename ReduceFunctor, typename BoundaryFunctor>
00122   static T run(const MapFunctor &map, const ReduceFunctor &reduce, const BoundaryFunctor& check, const T *a, const T *b, T boundary, T value) {
00123     return value;
00124   }
00125 };
00126 
00131 template <typename T, unsigned int D, unsigned int BoundCheckFreq>
00132 struct BoundedMapReduce<T, D, BoundCheckFreq, D, 0> {
00133   template <typename MapFunctor, typename ReduceFunctor, typename BoundaryFunctor>
00134   static T run(const MapFunctor &map, const ReduceFunctor &reduce, const BoundaryFunctor &check, const T *a, const T *b, T boundary, T value) {
00135     return value;

00143 template <typename T, unsigned int D, unsigned int i, unsigned int nextCheck>
00144 struct BoundedMapReduce<T, D, 0, i, nextCheck> {
00145   template <typename MapFunctor, typename ReduceFunctor, typename BoundaryFunctor>
00146   static T run(const MapFunctor &map, const ReduceFunctor &reduce, const BoundaryFunctor &check, const T *a, const T *b, T boundary, T value) {
00147     // This case should never be reached. BoundCheckFreq == 0 would lead to an infinite loop.
00148     assert(0);
00149   }
